com.github.dandelion.core
Class Context

java.lang.Object
  com.github.dandelion.core.Context

public class Context
extends Object

This class is in charge of discovering and storing several configuration points, such as the configured AssetCache implementation or the active AssetProcessors.

There should be only one instance of this class in the application.

Since:
0.10.0
Author:
Thibault Duchateau

Constructor Detail

Context

public Context(javax.servlet.FilterConfig filterConfig)
Public constructor.

Parameters:
filterConfig - The servlet filter configuration.
Method Detail

init

public void init(javax.servlet.FilterConfig filterConfig)

Performs all the required initializations of the Dandelion context.

Parameters:
filterConfig - The servlet filter configuration.

initConfiguration

public void initConfiguration(javax.servlet.FilterConfig filterConfig)

Returns an implementation of ConfigurationLoader using the following strategy:

  1. Check first if the dandelion.confloader.class system property is set and tries to instantiate it
  2. Otherwise, instantiate the StandardConfigurationLoader which reads properties files

initBundleLoaders

public void initBundleLoaders()

Initializes the BundleLoaders in a particular order:

  1. First, the VendorBundleLoader which loads all "vendor bundles"
  2. Then, all service providers of the BundleLoader SPI present in the classpath
  3. Finally the DandelionBundleLoader which loads "user bundles"

initAssetCache

public void initAssetCache()
Initializes the service provider of AssetCache to use for caching.

initAssetLocators

public void initAssetLocators()
Initializes all service providers of the AssetLocator SPI. The order doesn't matter.

initAssetProcessors

public void initAssetProcessors()

Initializes all service providers of the AssetProcessor SPI and stores them all in the processorsMap.

If minification is enabled, the activeProcessors is filled with default service providers.

initBundleStorage

public void initBundleStorage()

Initializes the BundleStorage by using all configured BundleLoaders.

Once loader, some checks are performed on the BundleStorage.

initMBean

public void initMBean(javax.servlet.FilterConfig filterConfig)
If JMX is enabled, initializes a MBean allowing to reload bundles and access cache.

Parameters:
filterConfig - The servlet filter configuration.

public void destroy()

getConfiguration

public Configuration getConfiguration()
Returns:
the Configuration store associated to the Dandelion Context .

isDevModeEnabled

public boolean isDevModeEnabled()
Returns:
true if the dandelion.mode configuration property is set to "development" or any other value than "production". If the mode is not explicitely configured, it returns true.
